column4: how can i  read more than 4 gig of RAM in  ubuntu server 8.10?
I think you can get it to see more than 4GB with 32bit with some hackish way, but a single process won't be able to address more than 2GB, or something along those lines.
anyway, 64bit is pretty much standard these days isn't it?
yes... and most CPU are also 64 bit ready
i both core 2 duo E7400  imachine
btw imachine how can i find a 64 bit ubuntu server?
unless you have the obscure ia64 setup. which, according to what you said earlier, you don't.
